annotation_sentence: Um, yes, please. I am looking for, uh, how to say, a thing for fixing paper together.

annotation_sentence: Yes, yes, stapler! I need to buy one for my, um, my office work.

annotation_sentence: Thank you, thank you. I appreciate your help.

annotation_sentence: Ah, okay. I will take this one. And, um, can I ask another question?

annotation_sentence: Thank you, I will go look now. You are very helpful!
